author: andschwa
body: Similar to the change made in `CorePsAssemblyLoadContext.cs`, we can eliminate native conversions from UTF-8 to 16 by changing the marshal type to LPStr when `LINUX` is defined, which we can safely do since it's now configuration dependent.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This really belongs in PSRP, and is optional. Closing.

title: Use LPStr in WSMan plugin on Linux
